department: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)

description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time.
full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: Client Experience Platform for the Digital Platform Modernization Phase 3**
===========================

**The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**, on behalf of the **Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC)**, invites proposals from interested bidders for a **Client Experience Platform (CXP)** in support of the **Digital Platform Modernization (DPM) Programme**.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

*   **Contract Type**: Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) Publisher and System Integrator (SI) Services
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3833985677
*   **Publication Date**: January 19, 2023
*   **Closing Date**: March 28, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 14, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: April 13, 2043

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The required services consist of two separate contracts:

1.  **Contract 1: SaaS Publisher**: Provide access to the Software-as-a-Service, cloud infrastructure, service operations, licensing, support and maintenance.
2.  **Contract 2: System Integrator (SI)**: Configure and implement the CXP into production, requiring close collaboration with the SaaS Publisher.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This bid is subject to trade agreements under the **Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement**, **World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)**, **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)**, **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)**, **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**, and other comprehensive agreements with BOHICA.

**Inquiries and Submissions**
---------------------------

*   All inquiries must be submitted in writing to [TPSGC.PAProjetMPN-APDPMProject.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:TPSGC.PAProjetMPN-APDPMProject.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
*   Please refer to the link below to access the RFP documents: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15176888?extsite=MTUxNzY4ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Note**: All bid submissions must be received by March 28,
